headline.main: WAR AID GIFTS ASKED OF NATION'S WORKERS; Wall Urges Donations of Hour's Pay for Labor Abroad

lead_paragraph: Matthew Woll, vice president of the A.F. of L. and chairman of the American Labor Committee to Aid British Labor, addressed an appeal yesterday to "every organized worker in the land" to contribute one hour's pay to help the workers in Great Britain and in all countries engaged in fighting Hitler or overrun by the Nazis.
abstract: M Woll, Amer Labor Com to Aid Brit Labor chmn, asks workers to give hr's pay
